Equipment Actions.Action 1: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 3 Slashing plus 2 Cold

Other Actions.Action 1: Frost Breath, The Mephit exhales a cone of freezing cold air.  Creatures caught in the area make a Dexterity saving throw, taking an Average 5 Cold damage

Abilities.Ability 1: Death Burst, When the Mephit dies, it explodes into a burst of jagged ice.  Nearby creatures take an Average 4 Slashing damage from the burst
Abilities.Ability 2: False Appearance, While the Mephit remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shard of ice
Abilities.Ability 3: Innate Spellcasting, The only spell known to be cast by this Mephit is Fog Cloud
